mil3.8:3.3: “Āma, bhante, jānāmi ‘sampati paṭhamo yāmo atikkanto, majjhimo yāmo pavattati, ukkā padīpīyanti, cattāri paṭākāni āṇattāni gamissanti bhaṇḍato rājadeyyānī’”ti.
mil3.8:4.2: “Āma, bhaṇe, paṇḍito thero, ediso ācariyo bhaveyya mādiso ca antevāsī, nacirasseva paṇḍito dhammaṃ ājāneyyā”ti.
mil3.8:4.3: Tassa pañhaveyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho rājā theraṃ nāgasenaṃ satasahassagghanakena kambalena acchādetvā “bhante nāgasena, ajjatagge te aṭṭhasataṃ bhattaṃ paññapemi, yaṃ kiñci antepure kappiyaṃ, tena ca pavāremī”ti—
mil3.8:4.6: “Jānāmi, bhante nāgasena, jīvasi, api ca attānañca rakkha, mamañca rakkhāhī”ti.
mil3.8:4.7: “Kathaṃ attānaṃ rakkhasi, ‘nāgaseno milindaṃ rājānaṃ pasādeti, na ca kiñci alabhī’ti parāpavādo āgaccheyyāti, evaṃ attānaṃ rakkha.
mil3.8:4.8: Kathaṃ mamaṃ rakkhasi, ‘milindo rājā pasanno pasannākāraṃ na karotī’ti parāpavādo āgaccheyyāti, evaṃ mamaṃ rakkhāhī”ti.
mil3.8:4.10: “Seyyathāpi, bhante, sīho migarājā suvaṇṇapañjare pakkhittopi bahimukhoyeva hoti;
mil3.8:4.11: evameva kho ahaṃ, bhante, kiñcāpi agāraṃ ajjhāvasāmi bahimukho yeva pana acchāmi.
mil3.8:4.12: Sace ahaṃ, bhante, agārasmā anāgāriyaṃ pabbajeyyaṃ, na ciraṃ jīveyyaṃ, bahū me paccatthikā”ti.
mil3.8:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno milindassa rañño pañhaṃ visajjetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā saṃghārāmaṃ agamāsi.
mil3.8:5.2: Acirapakkante ca āyasmante nāgasene milindassa rañño etadahosi—
mil3.8:5.3: “kiṃ mayā pucchitaṃ, kiṃ bhadantena nāgasenena visajjitan”ti?
mil3.8:5.5: “sabbaṃ mayā supucchitaṃ, sabbaṃ bhadantena nāgasenena suvisajjitan”ti.
mil3.8:5.7: “kiṃ milindena raññā pucchitaṃ, kiṃ mayā visajjitan”ti.
mil3.8:5.9: “sabbaṃ milindena raññā supucchitaṃ, sabbaṃ mayā suvisajjitan”ti.
mil3.8:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena milindassa rañño nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
mil3.8:6.2: Atha kho milindo rājā āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho milindo rājā āyasmantaṃ nāgasenaṃ etadavoca—
mil3.8:7.1: “Mā kho bhadantassa evaṃ ahosi ‘nāgaseno mayā pañhaṃ pucchito’ti teneva somanassena taṃ rattāvasesaṃ vītināmesīti na te evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.8:7.2: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, taṃ rattāvasesaṃ etadahosi—
mil3.8:7.3: ‘kiṃ mayā pucchitaṃ, kiṃ bhadantena visajjitan’ti, ‘sabbaṃ mayā supucchitaṃ, sabbaṃ bhadantena suvisajjitan’”ti.
mil3.8:8.2: “mā kho mahārājassa evaṃ ahosi ‘milindassa rañño mayā pañho visajjito’ti teneva somanassena taṃ rattāvasesaṃ vītināmesīti na te evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mil3.8:8.3: Tassa mayhaṃ, mahārāja, taṃ rattāvasesaṃ etadahosi—
mil3.8:8.4: ‘kiṃ milindena raññā pucchitaṃ, kiṃ mayā visajjitan’ti, ‘sabbaṃ milindena raññā supucchitaṃ, sabbaṃ mayā suvisajjitan’”ti itiha te mahānāgā aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ samanumodiṃsūti.
